user_input: Which NGAP procedure is used for inter-system load balancing? [3GPP Release 17]
response: diameter load control mechanism.
reference: uplink ran configuration transfer.

user_input: What is covered by enhanced application layer support for V2X services? [3GPP Release 17]
response: application layer support for v2x services including functional architecture information flows and network data analytics services as well as the enhancement of v2x scenario management and group communication.
reference: advanced v2x services.

user_input: What does the Load-Balancing steering mode do? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the loadbalancing steering mode introduced in 3gpp release 17 is a traffic steering mode that splits the traffic of a data flow between the 3gpp and the non3gpp accesses the network typically provides predefined or fixed percentage splits such as 20 on the 3gpp access and 80 on the non3gpp access however in release 17 the network may also provide an autonomous loadbalance indicator allowing the user equipment ue and the user plane function upf to independently select their own percentage splits for each access type subject to link status measurements this allows for maximum throughput of a given data flow in both the uplink and downlink directions.
reference: splits the traffic of a data flow across 3gpp and non3gpp accesses.

user_input: What is the main objective of intent driven management for service or network management? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the main objective of intent driven management for service or network management is to bring the network or services state to satisfy the new or updated intent.
reference: to reduce the complexity of management for network resources.

user_input: What does MINT stand for? [3GPP Release 17]
response: minimization of service interruption.
reference: minimization of service interruption.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Media Streaming AF Event Exposure work item? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to expose and manage media streaming sessions in a 5g network and to provide information and event notifications to the application provider ap and other network functions nfs.
reference: to support data collection and event exposure by an af to event consumers.

user_input: What is the purpose of load-balancing steering mode enhancements? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to enable autonomous loadbalancing and provide users with the best service experiencethroughput by allowing the ue and upf to maximize resource usage of the two accesses.
reference: to enable the ue and upf to freely select split percentages for each access type.

user_input: What is a capability added in the V2X Application Enabler (VAE) layer? [3GPP Release 17]
response: service provision capabilities.
reference: v2x service discovery.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Edge Data Network (EDN) in enabling edge applications? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the edge data network edn enables the deployment of edge applications by providing a local data network for the edge application server eas and edge enabler server ees to reside within thereby supporting the deployment and management of edge applications in a flexible and dynamic environment.
reference: to host the edge application servers and edge enabler server ees.

user_input: What are the three features specified in TS 23.304 for 5G ProSe Direct Communication over NR based PC5 reference point? [3GPP Release 17]
response: broadcast mode groupcast mode and unicast mode.
reference: broadcast mode groupcast mode unicast mode.

user_input: How is service continuity supported for specific slice(s)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to support service continuity for specific slices the solution addresses scenarios such as slice resource shortage in case of intrara mobility and interra mobility as well as no mobility scenarios involving network slice overload underperformance or termination and slarelated requirements for certain slices it involves remapping of traffic into the resource pool used by other slices adherence to resource allocation and reconfiguration rrm policy models defined in ts 28541 and preconfigured policies to avoid overloading the resource pool furthermore the remapping of remapped slice to ongoing slice when the ngran node recovers enough resources to serve ongoing slices is also supported this solution ensures continuity of services for ongoing slices and validates sa5.
reference: through multicarrier resource sharing or resource repartitioning.

user_input: How can UE power consumption due to false paging alarms be reduced? [3GPP Release 17]
response: subgroups of ues monitoring the same po can be further divided into multiple subgroups allowing a ue to monitor pdcch in its po for paging only if the subgroup to which the ue belongs is paged thereby reducing the number of wakeup for ssb and potentially reducing ue power consumption in idleinactive mode.
reference: by dividing ues into multiple subgroups.

user_input: What is the purpose of Generic Bootstrapping Architecture (GBA) in 5GC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: gba is integrated into 5gc to enable a more secure and flexible authentication process allowing network functions to interact with each other via dedicated reference point interfaces and providing a shared secret between network and ue enabling application functions to be leveraged to enable authentication and other application functions.
reference: to enable application functions to establish shared cryptographic material.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Small Data Transmission (SDT) feature in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the mtc device may be attached or detached tofrom the network before transmission of small amounts of data.
reference: to enable data transmission in the rrcinactive state for ues with infrequent data traffic.

user_input: What functionality does Signalling Based Activation provide? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the provided text does not contain information about signalling based activation so based on the provided context it cannot be determined what functionality signalling based activation provides.
reference: request for end user service performance information for one specific ue.

user_input: What are the enhancements for idle/inactive-mode UE power saving in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the enhancements for idleinactivemode ue power saving in nr include the introduction of extended drx edrx cycles that are longer than 1024s in both rrcinactive and rrcidle states with support for power saving with long edrx cycle values the enhancements also include the ability for the ue to determine early on in the slot whether there is a transmission to it and if there is no data for it to decode to turn off its receiver until the end of the slot additionally mechanisms such as crossslot scheduling power saving and downlink control channelbased triggering of ue adaptation in rrcconnected state are being specified for 3gpp release 16 to improve energy efficiency.
reference: paging enhancements to reduce ue reception power consumption.

user_input: How does a Multi-USIM UE indicate to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to CM-IDLE state? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a reject paging indication.
reference: by sending a reject paging response to the network.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Slice-Maximum Bit Rate (S-MBR)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the slicemaximum bit rate smbr is defined as a value that can be used by a network to determine the remaining maximum slice data rate available to allocate to a gbr service data flow when the utilized data rate calculated as the difference between the previously and newly authorized mbrs andor sessionambr exceeds the available maximum slice data rate.
reference: to limit the aggregate data rate per ue across all qos flows for all pdu sessions associated with a slice.

user_input: What aspects of the Disaster Roaming service are specified in TS 22.011 and TS 22.261? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ts 22011 and ts 22261 specify that the stage1 requirements for the minimization of service interruptions msi are satisfied for the disaster roaming service the relevant information in ts 22261 clause 631 and ts 22011 clause 322 are mentioned but it doesnt specify the exact aspects however based on the given clauses in the relevant information 2 it can be said that these clauses mention the systems ability to collect charging information for disaster inbound roamers with information about the applied disaster condition and support provision of services to disaster inbound roamers only within the specific region where the disaster condition applies.
reference: service requirements for the 5g system.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Provision of potential TRS/CSI-RS occasion(s) to idle/inactive-mode UEs? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the provision of potential trscsirs occasions to idleinactivemode ues is to inform the ue about available trs and csirs occasions.
reference: to reduce ue power consumption for synchronization.
